sentences.en: Conclusions : Immunologic derangement of cell immunity and humoral immune function is presented in CKD patients.
sentences.cn: 结论CKD患者存在细胞免疫及体液免疫功能紊乱.

sentences.en: Most people take it as a sign of derangement.
sentences.cn: 但大部分民众则将此番言论看作痴人说梦.

sentences.en: MRI is an ideal method to diagnose internal derangement of TMJ.
sentences.cn: 结论:mri是诊断关节内紊乱症理想的方法.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the relationship between joint effusion and temporomandibular joint internal derangement ( TMJID ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨渗出液与颞下颌关节内紊乱 ( TMJID ) 的关系,揭示渗出液的成因.

sentences.en: She began to think he was in mental derangement.
sentences.cn: 她开始想这个人一定是精神错乱了。

sentences.en: The'vice'is surely not that of the animal but the conditions that bring derangement.
sentences.cn: 这些 “ 恶行 ” 绝对不是动物的本性,而是环境造成它们的失序行为.

sentences.en: There is just enough validity in the idea for it to stop short of mental derangement.
sentences.cn: 这种观点尤其受到那些自认为拥有此种才能的人的追捧,但离精神错乱不过是一步之遥.

words.tran_cn: 使（精神）错乱（derange的过去分词和过去式）；扰乱

trans.tran_cn: 精神错乱，扰乱，狂乱，重排
